mapper.sql: uans_id, uts_id, qstn_id, subj_sctn_id, uans_content, uans_result
mapper.select: select uans_id, ual.uts_id, ual.qstn_id, ual.subj_sctn_id, uans_content, uans_result , qstn.QSTN_TITLE , qstn.QSTN_CODE from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join question_type qtype on qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID = qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID where uts_id = #{utsId} and qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID = #{type}

select uans_id, ual.uts_id, ual.qstn_id, ual.subj_sctn_id, uans_content, uans_result , qstn.QSTN_TITLE , qstn.QSTN_CODE , unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID, unit.SUBJ_UNIT_TITLE from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join question_type qtype on qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID = qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id left join subj_section sctn on sctn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID = ual.subj_sctn_id left join subj_unit unit on unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = sctn.SUBJ_UNIT_ID where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and utl.user_id = #{userId}

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and ual.qstn_id = #{qstnId}

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and ual.qstn_id = #{qstnId} and ual.uans_result = '0'

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and ual.qstn_id = #{qstnId} and ual.uans_result != '0'

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and ual.subj_sctn_id = #{sctnId}

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and ual.subj_sctn_id = #{sctnId} and ual.uans_result = '0'

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and ual.subj_sctn_id = #{sctnId} and ual.uans_result != '0'

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join question_type qtype on qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID = qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id left join subj_section sctn on sctn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID = ual.subj_sctn_id left join subj_unit unit on unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = sctn.SUBJ_UNIT_ID where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{unitId}

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join question_type qtype on qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID = qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id left join subj_section sctn on sctn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID = ual.subj_sctn_id left join subj_unit unit on unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = sctn.SUBJ_UNIT_ID where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{unitId} and ual.uans_result = '0'

select count(*) from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join question_type qtype on qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID = qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID left join user_test_list utl on utl.uts_id = ual.uts_id left join subj_section sctn on sctn.SUBJ_SCTN_ID = ual.subj_sctn_id left join subj_unit unit on unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = sctn.SUBJ_UNIT_ID where utl.tp_id = #{tpId} and unit.SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{unitId} and ual.uans_result != '0'
mapper.insert:
insert into user_answer_list
uans_id,
uts_id,
qstn_id,
subj_sctn_id,
uans_content,
uans_result,
#{uansId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{utsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uansContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uansResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update user_answer_list
uts_id = #{utsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qstn_id = #{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subj_sctn_id = #{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uans_content = #{uansContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uans_result = #{uansResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uans_id = #{uansId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_answer_list set uts_id = #{utsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qstn_id = #{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subj_sctn_id = #{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uans_content = #{uansContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uans_result = #{uansResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uans_id = #{uansId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
